parts.text: {"word":"satisfy","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人・欲求・必要など)を満たす、満足させる","english_definition":"to please someone by giving them what they want or need.","examples":[{"sentence":"Nothing seems to satisfy him.","translation":"彼は何をやっても満足しないようだ。"},{"sentence":"The meal was delicious and satisfying.","translation":"食事は美味しくて満足のいくものだった。"},{"sentence":"We need to satisfy our customers' needs.","translation":"顧客のニーズを満たす必要がある。"},{"sentence":"The company aims to satisfy the growing demand for electric cars.","translation":"その会社は電気自動車への高まる需要を満たすことを目指している。"}],"collocations":["satisfy a need (必要を満たす)","satisfy a desire (欲求を満たす)","satisfy a customer (顧客を満足させる)","satisfy a requirement (要件を満たす)","satisfy an obligation (義務を果たす)","satisfy curiosity (好奇心を満たす)","satisfy hunger (空腹を満たす)","satisfy thirst (喉の渇きを癒す)"],"synonyms":["fulfill","gratify","content","please","appease","suffice"],"antonyms":["dissatisfy","disappoint","frustrate"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(条件・基準など)を満たす、適合する","english_definition":"":"to meet or fulfill a condition, standard, or requirement.","examples":[{"sentence":"Does this proposal satisfy the requirements of the committee?","translation":"この提案は委員会の要件を満たしていますか？"},{"sentence":"The product must satisfy strict safety standards.","translation":"その製品は厳格な安全基準を満たさなければならない。"},{"sentence":"To pass the course, you must satisfy all the assessment criteria.","translation":"コースに合格するには、すべての評価基準を満たす必要があります。"}],"collocations":["satisfy criteria (基準を満たす)","satisfy requirements (要件を満たす)","satisfy standards (基準を満たす)","satisfy conditions (条件を満たす)","satisfy regulations (規制を満たす)","satisfy demands (要求を満たす)"],"synonyms":["meet","fulfill","comply with","conform to","adhere to"],"antonyms":["fail to meet","violate","contravene"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(確信・疑念など)を解消する、納得させる","english_definition":"to convince someone of something; to remove doubts or uncertainties.","examples":[{"sentence":"I hope this explanation satisfies your concerns.","translation":"この説明であなたの懸念が解消されることを願っています。"},{"sentence":"The evidence satisfied the jury that he was guilty.","translation":"その証拠は、彼が有罪であると陪審員を納得させた。"},{"sentence":"We need to satisfy ourselves that the system is secure.","translation":"システムが安全であることを確認する必要があります。"}],"collocations":["satisfy someone's doubts (人の疑念を解消する)","satisfy someone's concerns (人の懸念を解消する)","satisfy someone's curiosity (人の好奇心を満たす)","satisfy oneself (自分で確認する、納得する)"],"synonyms":["assure","convince","persuade","reassure","set at ease","allay"],"antonyms":["worry","doubt","alarm","disquiet"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「satisfier」（満足させる、十分にする）に由来し、さらにラテン語の「satisfacere」（十分に実行する、満足させる）から派生。これは「satis」（十分な）と「facere」（行う、作る）の組み合わせ。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈsætɪsfaɪ/","syllables":"sat-is-fy"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["satisfy","satisfies"],"past_simple":"satisfied","past_participle":"satisfied","present_participle":"satisfying"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**satisfy**」は、人や欲求を満たす、条件や基準を満たす、疑念や懸念を解消するという意味を持つ動詞です。対象によって意味合いが異なり、人に対しては「満足させる」、欲求に対しては「満たす」、基準に対しては「適合する」、疑念に対しては「解消する」という意味になります。再帰代名詞を伴って「satisfy oneself」の形で「自分で確認する、納得する」という意味でも使われます。類語として「fulfill」「meet」「please」などがありますが、それぞれニュアンスが異なります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The movie satisfied to me.","correct":"✓ The movie satisfied me.","note":"「satisfy」は他動詞なので、前置詞「to」は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The food was satisfying for me.","correct":"✓ The food was satisfying. / ✓ I was satisfied with the food.","note":"「satisfying」は形容詞として使う場合、主語は「満足させるもの」になります。人が満足した状態を表す場合は、「I was satisfied with...」のように受動態を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The results were not satisfied.","correct":"✓ The results were not satisfactory. / ✓ The results were not satisfying.","note":"結果が「満足させるものではない」場合は「satisfactory」または「satisfying」を使用します。結果が「満足した」状態を表す場合は「The results were not satisfied.」とは言いません。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["satisfaction (名詞: 満足、満足感)","satisfactory (形容詞: 満足のいく、申し分のない)","satisfying (形容詞: 満足させる、満ち足りた)","dissatisfy (動詞: 不満にさせる)","dissatisfaction (名詞: 不満、不満足)","unsatisfactory (形容詞: 不満足な、不十分な)","unsatisfying (形容詞: 満足させない)"],"idioms_phrases":["satisfy oneself (自分で確認する、納得する)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**satisfy**」は、何かが必要や欲求を満たしたり、人を喜ばせたりすることを意味する動詞です。例えば、「The meal satisfied my hunger.（その食事は私の空腹を満たした）」のように使います。また、基準や条件を満たすという意味もあります。「Does this meet your needs?」と聞く代わりに、「Does this **satisfy** your needs?」と言うこともできます。少しフォーマルな言葉なので、日常会話では「please」や「meet」を使うことも多いですが、ビジネスや学術的な場面ではよく使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The new policy aims to **satisfy** the needs of all employees.","translation":"新しい方針は、すべての従業員のニーズを満たすことを目指している。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"満たす（ニーズ）"},{"sentence":"Her performance **satisfied** the audience.","translation":"彼女のパフォーマンスは観客を満足させた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"満足させる（人）"},{"sentence":"The product must **satisfy** all safety regulations.","translation":"その製品はすべての安全規制を満たさなければならない。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"満たす（基準）"},{"sentence":"I hope this explanation **satisfies** your concerns.","translation":"この説明があなたの懸念を解消することを願っています。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"解消する（懸念）"},{"sentence":"We need to **satisfy** ourselves that the data is accurate.","translation":"データが正確であることを自分たちで確認する必要がある。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"納得する（自分自身）"}]}
